text: The Ghana national under-20 football team represents Ghana in international football completions. They have won both the African Youth Championship and FIFA U-20 World Cup in 2009. ==Competitive Record== ===FIFA World Youth Championship Record=== Year Round GP W D* L GS GA 1977 did not participate
